----- Original Message -----
Liz,

more friends.

Regina in Toledo

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Where in Ohio?
messages.messageBody:
<<Where are you, Liz? We're in West Toledo. The weather man is predicting 2
days of 30's next week, then 10 more days of frigid temps.>>


Hi Amy, we live in Sylvania. Not too far from you at all. My brother and
SIL live in West Toledo off of Jackman Rd. Small world!

I knew something was wrong this morning when I got all excited at the
prediction of 34 degrees one day this week. I am not a fan of cold weather,
and this whole Winter season has been down right frigid.

Liz
saremca@...
Age doesn't always bring wisdom, sometimes age comes alone.
